name: The Quest Up Penguin Peak
description:
help an adorable penguin climb his way up a large mountain, so he can enjoy a nice cup of hot chocolate.

Featuring
  • a cozy fire
  • grappling hook!
  • maps
  • spiky ice
  • icy spikes
  • four (4) freshly composed jams encompassing a variety of winter vibes™
  • yoinks, yeets, slides and similarly satisfying movement mechanics
  • precision platforming that made our animator rage quit
  • fun for up to and including one player!
Controls
  • arrow keys - move
  • x - jump/select
  • z - back

the page might not be done, but the game mostly is.
